records.name: Adaaran Prestige Water Villas – 24hrs Dine Around Premium All Inclusive

descriptions.general: The hotel are a resort that includes customized butler service and an à la carte dining venue. Guests can also enjoy the different culinary options of the resort's other four restaurants. This hotel is near in the beach and the estimated 30 km away from the Ifuru Airport Facilities and services include 24hr reception, Air Conditioning, Bar, Concierge facilities, Dry Cleaning, Ironing facilities, Laundry facilities, Multilingual staff, Outdoor pool, Restaurant, Sauna, Shuttle services, Spa facilities, Television and Wireless internet. Room feature Air conditioning, Cable/satellite TV, Coffee/tea making facilities, Hairdryer, Mini bar/fridge, Room service, Telephone and Television. The All Inclusive-concept includes all meals (breakfast, lunch, dinner and snacks) and mealtime drinks such as soft drinks, beer, wine, water and alcoholic drinks, all of local brands. Drinks are served from morning until late evening (approx until 22.-24.00 hrs). Opening times vary between different hotels. In certain hotels the activities program is also included. Please note that the hotel does not undertake responsibility for unsuitable weather conditions causing disruptions, delays, or cancellation of any transfers. Costs incurred due to the same will not be refundable in such cases. If guests cannot be transferred to (only) the resort from Malé, they will be relocated to the city. Transfer time duration is approximate and may change. Waiting time of up to three hours for seaplane transfers and may vary depending on weather conditions. During such times, guests will be accommodated at the Adaaran Lounge. In some cases, luggage may not be transported on the same flight transfer and may be forwarded on a later flight or via a speedboat. Please note transfers are conducted by a third-party supplier and the resort is not liable for loss or damages of any item. Guests may incur an additional charge for excess luggage. Transfer costs are subject to change without notice. Address: Raa Atoll Meedhupparu Island, 20026 Raa Atoll, Maldives, Maldives.

records.short_description: Stylish resort with outdoor pool, shuttle service and poolside bar
